text: Burhan Muhammad (3 August 1957 - 19 May 2015) was an Indonesian diplomat. From 14 November 2012 until his death, he was the Ambassador to Pakistan. He was born in Yogyakarta. Muhammad was badly burned and injured in a helicopter crash in Naltar, Gilgit-Baltistan, Pakistan on 8 May 2015. He later died at a hospital in Singapore, aged 57. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Indonesia to Pakistan Category:Indonesian diplomats Category:Indonesian politicians Category:People from Yogyakarta Category:Victims of aviation accidents or incidents in Pakistan Category:Victims of aviation accidents or incidents in 2015 Category:Victims of helicopter accidents or incidents
title: Burhan Muhammad
